contentrichtext.text: {{Refimprove|date=February 2009}} {{Infobox Espoo | Name = Matinkylä | Name-sv = Mattby | Map = Espoo districts Matinkyla.png | Main district = Suur-Matinkylä | Inner district = Matinkylän keskus, Tiistilä, Matinlahti, Matinmetsä | Population = 18,143 | Population year = 2006 | Finnish = 79.9 | Swedish = 11.3 | Other = 8.9 | Jobs = 3,419 }} '''Matinkylä''' ([[Finnish language|Finnish]]) or '''Mattby''' ([[Swedish language|Swedish]]) is one of the major urban areas of [[Espoo]], a city on the southern coast of [[Finland]]. Matinkylä is understood as the area between the Helsinki-Hanko highway and the coast of the [[Gulf of Finland]], between the areas of [[Haukilahti]] and [[Iivisniemi]]. [[Image:Kauppakeskus Iso Omena Espoo2.JPG|thumb|left|250px|Iso Omena (Big Apple) is one of the largest shopping centers in Finland]] About 30 000 people live in the Greater Matinkylä area, consisting of Matinkylä itself and the neighbouring areas of [[Olari, Espoo|Olari]] and [[Henttaa]]. [[Iso Omena]] ("the Big Apple"), one of Finland's biggest shopping malls, is situated in Matinkylä. Matinkylä is the final stop of the first stage of the future [[Länsimetro]]. A possible second stage is planned to extend all the way to [[Kivenlahti]]. The Matinkylä area is 15 minutes from [[Helsinki]] by [[bus]], and 10 minutes away by [[automobile]].{{fact|date=February 2009}} == See also == {{Commons category-inline|Matinkylä}} * [[Matinkylä metro station]] * [[Districts of Espoo]] == External links == * [http://map3.navici.com/NTP.bHZtIDMzNzI5ODQuNjYyOTQgNjY3NDc4Ni45NjkxNSA4NjAgNTc0IDcgYmtnZCAzNTM0NzkwIDY5NzcyMjAgbW92ZXRvIHsgIkt1b3BpbyIgbGFiZWwgeyB9IHdhbGsgbGVnIHsgMCAwIH0gd2FsayBsZWcgeyAtMTEyIC01MyAtNDggMzA1IDk2IC05MSAwIDAgfSB3YWxrIGxlZyAiS3VvcGlvIiBsYWJlbCB9IHJvdXRlLmRyYXcgc2hpcG91dA==.Aa0pfI9npRL0Bh+Z2Spyxj1PsFA=.png Map of Matinkylä] {{coord|60|10|N|24|45|E|region:FI_type:city_source:GNS-enwiki|display=title}} {{Espoo}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Matinkyla}} [[Category:Districts of Espoo]] {{SouthernFinland-geo-stub}}
